description:
11.116 haldclut
Apply a Hald CLUT to a video stream.

First input is the video stream to process, and second one is the Hald CLUT.
The Hald CLUT input can be a simple picture or a complete video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:


haldclut also has the same interpolation options as lut3d (both
filters share the same internals).

This filter also supports the framesync options.

More information about the Hald CLUT can be found on Eskil Steenberg’s website
(Hald CLUT author) at http://www.quelsolaar.com/technology/clut.html.
name: haldclut

parameters.description: Set which CLUT video frames will be processed from second input stream, can be first or all. Default is all.
parameters.name: clut

parameters.description: Force termination when the shortest input terminates. Default is 0.
parameters.name: shortest

parameters.description: Continue applying the last CLUT after the end of the stream. A value of 0 disable the filter after the last frame of the CLUT is reached. Default is 1.
parameters.name: repeatlast

source:
11.116 haldclut

Apply a Hald CLUT to a video stream.

First input is the video stream to process, and second one is the Hald CLUT. The Hald CLUT input can be a simple picture or a complete video stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

clut

Set which CLUT video frames will be processed from second input stream, can be first or all. Default is all.

shortest

Force termination when the shortest input terminates. Default is 0.

repeatlast

Continue applying the last CLUT after the end of the stream. A value of 0 disable the filter after the last frame of the CLUT is reached. Default is 1.

haldclut also has the same interpolation options as lut3d (both filters share the same internals).

This filter also supports the framesync options.

More information about the Hald CLUT can be found on Eskil Steenberg’s website (Hald CLUT author) at http://www.quelsolaar.com/technology/clut.html.
